page.title: 08HOME LIFE STYLES
page.content: Household Equipment. 50 children were asked what pieces of equipment they had at home.Our results show the percentage who owned each of the following:coloured t.v. 96%;refrigerator 96%;washing machine 95%;deep freeze 92%; record player 92%; tumble drier 58%; computer 50%;video 42%;b.and w.t.v.40%;t.v.with Ceefax 28%;microwave 26%;dish washer 22%. Favourite Dinner. 150 children were asked what dinner they liked the best:-24% chose fish and chips,23% roast,14% salad,8% spaghetti bolognese,6% shepherds pie and 6% chicken. The least popular was liver and bacon, only 1 child choosing this as her favourite meal.
